entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:34 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 3:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow overnight. Rain over southern sections early this evening. Amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
